response.body: {"msg":"This is the password reset link request form"}

item.name: Handle an incoming password reset link request.

request.description:
This api handles the form submission
We will send the password reset link to this user. Once we have attempted
to send the link, we will examine the response then see the message we
need to show to the user. Finally, we'll send out a proper response.
should contain email, new password & password confirmation fields

item.name: Handle an incoming new password request.

request.description:
This api handles the form submission
Here we will attempt to reset the user's password. If it is successful we
will update the password on an actual user model and persist it to the
database. Otherwise we will parse the error and return the response.

Item Management
item.description: APIs for placing item feedback and rating

item.name: Add item Feedback Rating to the order.

request.description:
This endpoint allows user to add feedback and rating to a special item.

The user can add feedback and rating to any item he want.
The user can add more than feedback and rating to different item

<aside class="notice">the user add feedback and rating to many different item</aside>

item.name: Order Management
item.description: APIs for placing orders and modifying them

request.description: recieve a cart and place an order with cart info

This endpoint allows user to see all his order history.

Enable user to see all his old orders as if his want to take the same order again

<aside class="notice">when the user want to see his histroy he can see it</aside>

response.name: success

request.description:
This endpoint allows user to add feedback to his order.

the user can put a feedback about the order that he paid

<aside class="notice">The user add a feedback to an order </aside>

This endpoint allows user to add rate to his order.

the user can put a rate about the order that he paid

<aside class="notice">The user add a rate to an order </aside>

This endpoint allows you to add additional comment to the order.

The user can add additional comment to the order
Ex: The customer wants the food spicy.

response.name: success

item.name: address Management
item.description: APIs for adding new address or updating old one for customers

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to add address to the order.

The user can add favourite address to facilitate the usage for him
and also can add multiple addresses in his account

<aside class="notice">when the user add new address it takes place of the old one</aside>

response.name: success

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to add favourite address to the order.

The user can add favourite address to facilitate the usage for him

<aside class="notice">when the user add new favourite address it takes place of the old one</aside>

response.name: success

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to add another address to the order differ from the old one he ordered by.

The user can add another address to facilitate the usage for him

<aside class="notice">when the user add new another address it takes place of the old one</aside>

response.name: success
